dcterms:creator: Andrew G Barto
Richard S Sutton
man Anderson
Charles W
dcterms:description: The CartPole environment is widely used in the verification of reinforcement learning algorithms, featuring a four-dimensional state space where the agent must balance a pole on a cart. The agent receives rewards for maintaining balance and negative rewards for failing to do so.
dcterms:title: CartPole

dcterms:creator: Greg Brockman
Vicki Cheung
Ludwig Pettersson
Jonas Schneider
John Schulman
Jie Tang
Wojciech Zaremba
dcterms:description: OpenAI Gym is a toolkit for developing and comparing reinforcement learning algorithms. It provides a variety of environments, including the CartPole, for testing and benchmarking.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym

dcterms:creator: Prafulla Dhariwal
Christopher Hesse
Oleg Klimov
Alex Nichol
Matthias Plappert
Alec Radford
John Schulman
Szymon Sidor
Yuhuai Wu
Peter Zhokhov
dcterms:description: OpenAI Baselines is a set of high-quality implementations of reinforcement learning algorithms. It includes implementations for various algorithms such as Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) and Deep Q-Learning.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Baselines
